name: Maple, The Magic Squirrel
description:
This is a short platformer game I made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022. You play as a squirrel who can magically turn into a leaf to maneuver around spikes. It's my second game jam ever 🎉

If you have Love2D installed, it the easiest to just download and run the .love file. Since I only have a Linux computer, the Apple and Windows version of the game may not work, so I'm really sorry if that's the case. 

Credits:

  • Art: Samuel Collier (Me), OpenGameArt, and itch.io
  • Music: OpenGameArt
  • SFX: Zapsplat.com
